t: Tried and Tested: FreedConn BM12 Helmet
s: December 18, 2023 - When I opened the FreedConn BM12 Helmet for the first time, it was immediately noticeable that the external structure of the helmet was a bit cheap. It appears to have a decent shape and design, but it doesn’t have the same quality and feel as a bigger brand-name helmet.
